title: 7 people found dead in Oklahoma were shot in the head in apparent murder-suicide, authorities say
description: A convicted rapist on trial for child pornography charges is believed to have fatally shot six people, five of them teenagers, before taking his own life at the rural Oklahoma property where the kids were having a sleepover last weekend, authorities said Wednesday.

title: White House details ‘severe damage’ to the economy if debt ceiling default occurs
description: The White House will publish on Wednesday new warning about the potential damage to the U.S. economy and taxpayers should the debt ceiling not be lifted.

title: Trump won't put on a defense case in alleged rape trial, his attorney says
description: Donald Trump will not present a defense case in his civil trial on allegations he raped writer E. Jean Carroll in the 1990s, his attorney said Wednesday.

title: Suspect at large in shooting at Atlanta medical facility that left 1 dead and multiple injured, police say
description: Gunfire erupted at an Atlanta medical facility on Wednesday, killing at least one person and wounding four as police searched for the assailant, authorities said.

title: Hackers hijacked a university's emergency system to threaten students and faculty
description: Hackers hijacked a Virginia university’s emergency alerts system this week and, in what appears to be a first, used it to issue threats to students and faculty: The university must pay up or their files would be leaked online.

title: Meta misled parents over privacy of Facebook's Messenger Kids app, FTC says
description: The Federal Trade Commission is proposing to ban Facebook from monetizing the data of users under 18 years old, the third time the agency has taken action against the company for allegedly violating users’ privacy.

title: FDA approves world's first RSV vaccine, a shot for adults ages 60 and up
description: The FDA has approved the world's first RSV vaccine: a single-dose shot for adults ages 60 and up, made by pharma company GSK.

title: States threaten crackdown on copycat versions of Ozempic and Wegovy
description: Unauthorized versions of semaglutide, the active ingredient in weight-loss drugs Ozempic and Wegovy, are facing crackdowns from a growing number of states.

title: 10-year-olds among hundreds of children found working at McDonald's restaurants
description: More than 300 children, including two 10-year-olds, were found working at McDonald's restaurants across Kentucky and several other states in violation of federal labor laws, the Labor Department said Tuesday.

title: Jenny Craig tells employees it will shut its doors
description: Jenny Craig will close its doors after four decades in the weight loss and nutrition business, according to internal communications to employees reviewed by NBC News.

title: Several people are arrested after the Texas man accused of killing 5 neighbors is captured
description: Several more arrests have been made following the high-profile capture of Francisco Oropesa, the man accused of killing five of his neighbors in their Texas home, as his bond is expected to be set at $5 million, officials said Wednesday morning.

title: Russia claims Ukraine tried to assassinate Putin in drone attack on the Kremlin
description: Russia claimed Wednesday that Ukraine tried to assassinate President Vladimir Putin in an overnight drone attack on the Kremlin.

title: Federal Reserve confronts 'contradictory' economy today as it considers next interest rate hike
description: Many consumers would agree that between inflation and tighter credit conditions, this is the worst they’ve felt about their finances since the pandemic swooped in.

title: McConnell treads warily around debt limit fight as fears of default catastrophe grow
description: Mitch McConnell is refusing to get involved in finding a debt ceiling solution as Kevin McCarthy and President Biden remain at an impasse.

title: More than 100 arrested across Europe in raids on notorious mafia group
description: Police across Europe arrested more than 100 people Wednesday in a wave of raids against one of Italy’s most notorious organized crime groups.

title: Florida man charged with setting off explosive device in Capitol tunnel during Jan. 6 riot
description: Daniel Ball, 38, of Homosassa is the only Jan. 6 defendant charged with setting off an explosive device during the attack on the Capitol.

title: Officer on traffic stop barely avoids vehicle spinning out at 120 mph on Virginia highway
description: A police officer in the suburbs of Washington, D.C. narrowly escaped an out-of-control car that came speeding at him from across the median during a traffic stop — and it was all captured on dash-cam video.

title: Man accused of killing 5 neighbors in Texas is apprehended after manhunt
description: The man accused of killing five of his neighbors with an AR-15 rifle in their Texas home was apprehended by law enforcement agents Tuesday, officials said.

title: Third inmate who escaped Mississippi jail is found dead in New Orleans truck stop
description: An inmate who escaped from a Mississippi jail last month was found dead at a truck stop in New Orleans, authorities said Tuesday, leaving one of four suspects who broke out of the facility on the run.
